      • \CaseInsensitiveArray

      CaseInsensitiveArray allows accessing elements with mixed-case keys.

      This allows access to the array to be very forgiving. (i.e. If you access something with the wrong CaSe, it'll still find the correct element)

      package Postmark-PHP
